Abyssal Celebrant Undrias:
The Dark Elf village! The brilliant underground city and the product of our race's brilliant civilization and developed skills! The beauty is often compared to that of obsidian that shines a lucid light in the dark.
To find the Dark Elf village, follow the road before me. Then you will come to the entrance of a tunnel that leads under the rock mountain. Follow the tunnel and you will enter the village.

Abyssal Celebrant Undrias:
May the blessing of the abyss be with you!
The massive structure you see behind me is the Temple of Shilen where we serve Shilen, mother of the abyss. I am the Abyssal Celebrant Undrias who serves our goddess.

Abyssal Celebrant Undrias:
The Shilen Temple is a cultural treasure, with a history of more than 2,000 years. In the days when our race lived underground, the Harnea of the Arachne race spun silver spider webs and protected the temple by spinning a curtain around it.
Here, all young Dark Elves undergo rites to receive Shilen's blessing before beginning their new lives as Dark Fighters or Dark Mystics.
